Package Minigame

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrow
    represents angle basketball would be thrown based on mouse coordinates
    BallGame
    creates small simulation of shooting a ball into a basketball hoop
    BasketBall
    In the basketball mini-game, a ball that can travel in a parabolic motion
    MiniGamePortal
    gives user access to a minigame from the GameWindow
    MusicGame
    creates small game of pressing correct keys in rhythm with a tune
    MusicReader
    scans a formatted file and translate into a rhythm that will be played in MusicGame
    Net
    basketball net that basketball passed through to score
    Note
    node that scrolls up the screen and must be hit at the right location
    Player
    represent object that user controls and can move around
    Sign
    indicator of a correct or incorrect note that fades away
